title: Base Characterization
description: Schema for submitting a characterization (antibody or biosample) to ENCODE
comment: Characterization images and captions accompany antibody lots submitted for review and biosamples containing constructs

characterizes.description: The specific object for which the characterization image applies.
characterizes.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a uuid

characterization_method.description: Experimental method for the characterization image
characterization_method.comment: Choose from one of the enumerated characterization methods used to characterized the antibody lot or biosample. [This list will likely get mapped to an experimental methods ontology in the future.]
characterization_method.title: Antibody or biosample characterization method
enum: Western blot, Western blot after IP

caption.description: A free-text caption for the characterization image
caption.comment: Captions for antibody characterizations should include brief methods, expected MW, cell line(s), labels and justification for acceptance, if necessary
caption.title: Image caption

date.description: Date in which the characterization experiment was run
date.comment: Dates should be formatted as YYYY-MM-DD
date.title: Date characterized

references.comment: If characterization data is from a publication, provide the relevant Pubmed identifier(s) in PMID:NNNNNNNN format
references.title: References

reference.description: Pubmed id for a published reference
reference.title: Pubmed reference

status.description: Approval status for the Characterization image
status.comment: Use the default, all other values are assigned by the DCC. The status code indicates the current state of the characterization image
status.title: Approval status

comment.description: Comment(s), if any, to associate to the characterization or the status of the characterization
comment.comment: A free-text field for comments relating to the characterization or its status
comment.title: Characterization comment
